title: Advancing Glaucoma Identification with Deep Learning: Utilizing Efficient Neural Networks for Enhanced Analysis of Retinal Fundus Images
details: R Kumar, H Ram Shah - International Journal of Computing and Digital Systems, 2024
abstract: Glaucoma is a chronic ocular condition that, if left untreated, can result in permanent blindness. Glaucoma can be challenging to detect and diagnose due to its tendency to induce subtle alterations in the retina. Experienced ophthalmologists frequently …
